detail_desc: Straight-cut jacket in a textured weave with frayed edges. Notch lapels, a button at the front, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Shoulder bag in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Zip and adjustable shoulder strap at the top, an outer compartment with an elastic drawstring at the top and a concealed hook and loop fastening, and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 8x34x50 cm.
Polo shirt in a soft, fine knit with a rib-knit collar, button placket, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and straight hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a hole pattern. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist, ties and plastic rings at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Short, off-the-shoulder, fitted dress in a smocked viscose weave with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a frill trim at the top and hem.

Small shoulder bag in woven fabric with a small fabric appliqué on the front, a double-ended zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with plastic buckles and carabiner hooks. One zipped outer compartment and one inner compartment. Lined. Depth 4 cm. Width 15.5 cm. Height 20.5 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lace trim and pleated frill at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in airy jersey with a turtle neck and extra-long sleeves.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Ribbed top in soft jersey made from a mulberry silk and cotton blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.

Wide, straight-cut shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gathered yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, short, wide sleeves in a double layer for added volume, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Fancy dress unicorn cape in soft pile with a padded hood with a sewn-on horn and ears, and a contrasting colour mane. Embroidered eyes, padded wings on the back and a detachable tail. Open dolman sleeves with pockets for the hands at the cuffs.
Knee-length jacket in airy, patterned chiffon with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Wrapover front with a tie belt at the waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved playsuit in stretch, patterned jersey with a V-neck and wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in a soft, organic cotton textured weave with a frill trim at the front, elastication at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a round neck and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.
Shorts in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and lace trims.
Ankle-length, 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and kick-flare legs.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Sports jacket with a high collar, zip down the front and contrasting colour panels down the sleeves. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slippers in soft faux fur with anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Top in block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in washed cotton twill with a high waist that has a small, V-shaped opening at the back. Zip fly and button, side pockets, back pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, rib-knit organic cotton with buttons at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide light support. Wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted, rib-knit cardigan in a soft, fine viscose blend with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Transparent silicone smartphone case with an adjustable fabric neck cord.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short skirt in woven fabric with smocking at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Push-up bralette in lace with decorative lacing at the front and moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle-length skirt in an airy, textured weave with a high waist and wrapover front with ties at one side. Lined.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, seam under the bust and sewn-in ties at the back of the waist. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim, and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Single-breasted jacket in a woven fabric with notch lapels, long sleeves, a chest pocket and welt front pockets. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder, A-line dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Smocking with a small frill trim at the top and short sleeves with smocking and a frill at the hems. Lined.
Wide trousers in a printed weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back, side pockets and straight legs with creases.
Top in narrow-ribbed jersey with a soft, deep V-neck front and back, short sleeves with overlocked edges, and an overlocked edge at the hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
High-waisted, slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with lacing at the back of the waistband and a concealed zip in one side.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with a print motif at the top. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

prod_name: Jade Trash HW Skinny Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, round neckline and gently rounded hem.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Short, sleeveless dress in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. Gathered seams at the shoulders and a seam with covered elastication under the bust. Unlined.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in an airy weave made from a modal blend with narrow notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and diagonal welt side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Set with a T-shirt in cotton jersey and pair of dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable fasteners at the front, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Coat in imitation suede with a faux fur lining, raw edges, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams.
Cap in a cotton weave with elastication at the back.
Short, fitted lace dress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, shaped cups and a V-neck at the front. Lined.
Short dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers with lacing at the front and platform soles covered in braided jute. Canvas insoles and fluted soles. Platform approx. 4 cm.
Hoop earrings in metal and plastic. Diameter 3.8-4.5 cm.

Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Top with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Water bottle in plastic with a detachable fabric wrist strap and non-drip lid with a straw. Capacity 450 ml.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front, smocking at the back and a seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Lined.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Off-the-shoulder dress in jersey crêpe with a gathered V-neck and short, elasticated sleeves with frill trims. Double layer of fabric at the top, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined skirt.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. T-shirt in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with buttons at the back of the neck and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Padded baseball jacket in felted fabric with imitation leather sleeves, appliqués on the front and a ribbed stand-up collar. Press-studs down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a terry text appliqué on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
